content:
Prev: Seebe Up: Banff Next: Recapitulating Orogeny

Redearth Vista



Everyone stopped at this vista point to take pictures of the Bow River, which was indeed pretty. But this was what you saw if you only turned around.
Taken Wednesday, August 19, 2009, 08:08:28AM. Original image size: 3888x2592, 2.1Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS 40D, 1/40s@ F11, ISO 100, 17-85mm f/4-5.6 IS, 33mm (52mm equiv)
PS CS2 5700:7, 0.5:10:50:25:20, RC-30, USM 10:200 20:2
